translation: There are two types of beings in this world: the divine and the demoniacal. The divine has been described at length; hear from Me, O Arjuna, about the demoniacal.
commentary: 16.6 Two two? Bhutasargau types of beings? People in the world? in this (in) this? Destiny the divine? Asura: demonical? Eve even? f and? Destiny the divine? in detail at length? Proktaá¸¥ has been described? Asura demoniacal? Partha O Partha? Me from Me? Listen hear.Commentary The two divisions of created beings? the one divine and the other satanic? carry on their respective activities in accordance with their natural
